Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FlipFitCentreDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCentreDAOImpl
public interface FlipFitCentreDAOInterface
Interface for operations related to gym centres in the FlipFit system. Provides methods for managing gym centres, including adding, removing, and modifying gym details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addGym(FlipFitCentre centre)
    Adds a new gym centre to the system.
    List<FlipFitCentre>
    getAllGymCentres(String ownerId)
    Retrieves a list of gym centres by a specific gym owner.
    FlipFitCentre
    getGymById(String gymId)
    Retrieves a gym centre by its ID.
    List<FlipFitCentre>
    getGymListByCity(String city)
    Retrieves a list of gym centres located in a specific city.
    List<FlipFitCentre>
    getGymListByCityAndOwner(String city, String ownerId)
    Retrieves a list of gym centres located in a specific city and registered under a specific gym owner.
    List<FlipFitCentre>
    getRegisteredGymCentres(String ownerId)
    Retrieves a list of gym centres registered by a specific gym owner.
    boolean
    modifyGym(String ownerId, String gymId, String gymCity, String gymName, String gymAddress)
    Modifies the details of an existing gym centre.
    void
    removeGym(String ownerId, String centreId)
    Removes a gym centre from the system.

  • Method Details

    • getGymById

      FlipFitCentre getGymById(String gymId)
      Retrieves a gym centre by its ID.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym centre to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The FlipFitCentre object representing the gym centre, or null if no gym centre is found with the given ID.

    • getGymListByCity

      List<FlipFitCentre> getGymListByCity(String city)
      Retrieves a list of gym centres located in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city where the gym centres are located.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitCentre objects representing the gym centres in the specified city.

    • getGymListByCityAndOwner

      List<FlipFitCentre> getGymListByCityAndOwner(String city, String ownerId)
      Retrieves a list of gym centres located in a specific city and registered under a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      city - The city where the gym centres are located.
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner whose gym centres are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitCentre objects representing the gym centres in the specified city and registered under the specified owner.

    • addGym

      void addGym(FlipFitCentre centre)
      Adds a new gym centre to the system.
      Parameters:
      centre - The FlipFitCentre object representing the gym centre to be added.

    • removeGym

      void removeGym(String ownerId, String centreId) throws UnauthorizedGymOwnerException
      Removes a gym centre from the system.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner requesting the removal of the gym centre.
      centreId - The ID of the gym centre to be removed.
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedGymOwnerException - If the gym owner is not authorized to remove the gym centre.

    • modifyGym

      boolean modifyGym(String ownerId, String gymId, String gymCity, String gymName, String gymAddress) throws UnauthorizedGymOwnerException, InvalidGymException
      Modifies the details of an existing gym centre.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner requesting the modification.
      gymId - The ID of the gym centre to be modified.
      gymCity - The new city of the gym centre.
      gymName - The new name of the gym centre.
      gymAddress - The new address of the gym centre.
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedGymOwnerException - If the gym owner is not authorized to modify the gym centre.
      InvalidGymException - If the provided gym ID is invalid or not found.

    • getAllGymCentres

      List<FlipFitCentre> getAllGymCentres(String ownerId)
      Retrieves a list of gym centres by a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner whose registered gym centres are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitCentre objects representing the gym centres registered by the specified owner.

    • getRegisteredGymCentres

      List<FlipFitCentre> getRegisteredGymCentres(String ownerId)
      Retrieves a list of gym centres registered by a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner whose registered gym centres are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitCentre objects representing the gym centres registered by the specified owner.
